name: Easytruss
body:
## _Welcome to EasyTruss official page._

###  **EasyTruss** is a simple application for design and analyse simple truss.



***

> "EasyTruss is fast and free." _Dr. S.F.Saghravani_

***

> "We used to design our truss with EasyTruss." _Dr. F.Alaee_



Designed and developed by [Farzad Karkhani's profile](www.twitter.com/farzadkarkhani) in Adobe Flash Actionscript2.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
